reviews.text: Pizza was amazing and the gelato was the best I've had in Columbus. Service was great- Craig and Ian took great care of our large party.
This is a great place. Small crafty place. They pay personal attention to your pizza. We tried the margherita and clintonvillain pizza. Both were delicious....

Food gets a 4 read on for the 3.5

First thought...be prepared to find parking and you'll pay for parking.  It's on a fairly busy street so be patient and...
